item.description:
OPEN MIC: LAST CALL FOR MUSICIANS
OPEN TO PARTY GOERS AND BEER DRINKERS 7:30 - 11:00PM

Free Live Music in Union Square. Great venue, talented musicians and an open mike. This is an opportunity for you to mingle with others and have a drink while listening to local area musicians.

Attention: All Music Lovers, Musicians, & Singers!! Come join the party at the Mon Night Open Mic! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge - Play music solo or with backing band. All instruments and styles welcome. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers.

Street parking is available on Somerville Ave.
item.name: OPEN MIC @ P.A.s Lounge (Union Square)
